function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Worldwide spread of SARS-CoV-2 leading to containment measures and quarantine","Impact":"Disruption of daily life, social distancing, and self-isolation leading to reduced physical activity","Mitigation":"Encouraging home workout and indoor physical activity","Technologies":"Online fitness platforms, home workout equipment","People":"General population in quarantine","Owner":"Health authorities, fitness organizations"},{"Description":"Limited sample size for the study","Impact":"Potential lack of generalizability and reliability of findings","Mitigation":"Recommending larger-scale studies for validation","Technologies":"Data collection tools for large-scale surveys","People":"Research community","Owner":"Research institutions, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Absence of national health monitoring and surveillance system for physical activity in Italy","Impact":"Lack of data on activity levels of the general public","Mitigation":"Establishing a national health monitoring and surveillance system for physical activity","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, data collection tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
